item.title: WATCH: California's Proposition 50 will pass, ABC News projects
item.description: California's Proposition 50, redrawing the congressional map to make five districts more Democratic-leaning, will pass, ABC News projects.

item.title: Election 2025: Winners make history across the country
item.description: The state of Virginia elected its first-ever female governor.
